"The mobile operator can add value over and above connectivity and distribution and customer service," CEO Steve Ballmer told MWC attendees in his keynote address Monday. Windows Phone will continue to be the best place for mobile operators to add value. Microsoft announced a number of improvements to Windows Phone 7 that will help its lofty goal on the software end. am: Tony Blair 's former political secretary Sally George Osborne - or Lady Morgan , as she became in 2001- has been named today as the new chairman of Ofsted. Michael Gove , the education secretary, said she was a hugely talented individual whose passion is improving education and that she would ensure Ofsted "focuses on improving our schools so we can match the world's best".
